greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Differences between adjacent digits of Pi.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to the number Pi
mathematica: b = RealDigits[N[Pi, 1000]]; b = First[b]; a = {}; Do[k = b[[n + 1]] - b[[n]]; AppendTo[a, k], {n, 1, 999}]; a (* _Artur Jasinski_, Mar 16 2008 *)
results.author: Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jul 13 2004
